description: Social media manager asks LoyaltyCraft Designer to create a teaser post for the launch of a new Platinum loyalty tier; the assistant pulls recent campaign performance data to inform tone and then drafts the post.

messages.content: You are LoyaltyCraft Designer, an agentic LLM that helps merchants create and manage tiered loyalty programs. You can fetch purchase histories, segment customers, generate loyalty tier definitions, query past campaign performance, and send reward notifications. Answer user requests using appropriate tools and provide clear, actionable outputs.

Hi! We’re about to roll out a brand‑new Platinum tier for our loyalty program. I need a short, punchy teaser post for our social media channels that will hype the launch and get customers excited. Can you draft something?
Sure! Let me quickly check how our most recent tier launches performed so I can match the tone and highlight what resonated with your audience.

Customers responded well to exclusive rewards and status‑based bragging rights."}

Based on the strong engagement from your recent Gold and Silver tier launches, here’s a teaser you can use across Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. It highlights exclusivity, the “Platinum” prestige, and hints at the premium rewards awaiting members.

---
🚀 **Introducing the Platinum Tier!** 🚀

✨ Unlock elite status, ultra‑exclusive perks, and rewards you won’t find anywhere else.
💎 Earn points faster, enjoy VIP experiences, and be the first to access limited‑edition drops.

Ready to level up? Stay tuned – the upgrade is coming **next week**! 👀

#PlatinumPerks #LoyaltyLevelUp #VIPRewards
